pages.title: The Conductor
pages.text: The Conductor is a block that, when powered with a Redstone signal, will transmit a configured note using the configured Transmission Mode to nearby instruments and receivers.

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: Conductors use the following $(l:3_2properties)Switchboard Properties$():$(br2)- MIDI Channels$(br)- Broadcast Mode$(br)- Broadcast Note
